description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of evaluating a measure.

identifier.description: A formal identifier that is used to identify this report when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

status.description: The report status. No data will be available until the report status is complete.

type.description: The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides a single patient's score for the measure; a patient listing, which returns the list of patients that meet the various criteria in the measure; or a summary report, which returns a population count for each of the criteria in the measure.

measure.description: A reference to the Measure that was evaluated to produce this report.

patient.description: Optional Patient if the report was requested for a single patient.

date.description: The date this measure report was generated.

period.description: The reporting period for which the report was calculated.

group.description: The results of the calculation, one for each population group in the measure.

evaluatedResources.description: A reference to a Bundle containing the Resources that were used in the evaluation of this report.

allOf.description: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of evaluating a measure.

identifier.description: The identifier of the population group as defined in the measure definition.

population.description: The populations that make up the population group, one for each type of population appropriate for the measure.

measureScore.description: The measure score for this population group, calculated as appropriate for the measure type and scoring method, and based on the contents of the populations defined in the group.

stratifier.description: When a measure includes multiple stratifiers, there will be a stratifier group for each stratifier defined by the measure.

allOf.description: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of evaluating a measure.

identifier.description: The identifier of the population being reported, as defined by the population element of the measure.

count.description: The number of members of the population.

patients.description: This element refers to a List of patient level MeasureReport resources, one for each patient in this population.

allOf.description: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of evaluating a measure.

identifier.description: The identifier of this stratifier, as defined in the measure definition.

stratum.description: This element contains the results for a single stratum within the stratifier. For example, when stratifying on administrative gender, there will be four strata, one for each possible gender value.

allOf.description: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of evaluating a measure.

value.description: The value for this stratum, expressed as a string. When defining stratifiers on complex values, the value must be rendered such that the value for each stratum within the stratifier is unique.

population.description: The populations that make up the stratum, one for each type of population appropriate to the measure.

measureScore.description: The measure score for this stratum, calculated as appropriate for the measure type and scoring method, and based on only the members of this stratum.

allOf.description: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of evaluating a measure.

identifier.description: The identifier of the population being reported, as defined by the population element of the measure.

count.description: The number of members of the population in this stratum.

patients.description: This element refers to a List of patient level MeasureReport resources, one for each patient in this population in this stratum.
